00020 class CountedReferece //ref
00021 {
00022         static int m_cRefObjects;
00023 
00024         friend int ObjectsOutstanding();
00025         friend class Counted;
00026         friend class String;
00027 
00028 protected:
00029         int m_cReferences;
00030         Counted* m_pcounted;
00031 
00032 public:
00033         CountedReferece(Counted* pcounted)
00034         {
00035                 DEBUGONLY(m_cRefObjects++);
00036                 UD1("REFCREATE: reference 0x%x created. objects outstanding: %d", (int)this, m_cRefObjects);
00037 
00038                 m_cReferences=0;
00039                 m_pcounted=pcounted;
00040         }
00041 
00042         ~CountedReferece()
00043         {
00044                 DEBUGONLY(m_cRefObjects--);
00045                 UD1("REFDESTROY: reference 0x%x destroyed. objects outstanding: %d", (int)this, m_cRefObjects);
00046         }
00047 };
00048 
00049 inline int ObjectsOutstanding(){
00050 #if DEBUG >= 0
00051         return CountedReferece::m_cRefObjects;
00052 #else
00053         return 0;
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 }

00058 class Counted // count
00059 {
00060         template<class COUNTED>
00061         friend COUNTED* ClaimPointer(COUNTED *pcount);
00062 
00063         template<class COUNTED>
00064         friend COUNTED* HandoffPointer(COUNTED *pcount);
00065         friend void ReleasePointer(Counted *pcount);
00066 
00067         friend class String;
00068 
00069 protected:      
00070         int m_cPointerRefs;
00071 
00072 public:
00073         mutable CountedReferece* m_pref;
00074 
00075         Counted() 
00076         {
00077                 m_pref=new CountedReferece(this);
00078                 UD2("CREATE: counted created 0x%x with reference 0x%x", (int)this, (int)m_pref);
00079                 m_cPointerRefs=1;
00080                 Claim();
00081         }
00082 
00083         Counted(const Counted& refc)
00084         {
00085                 m_pref=refc.m_pref;
00086                 UD2("CREATE: counted created 0x%x with copied reference 0x%x", (int)this, (int)m_pref);
00087                 m_cPointerRefs=refc.m_cPointerRefs;
00088                 Claim();
00089         }
00090 
00091         virtual ~Counted() ALWAYS_INLINE
00092         {
00093                 UD2("DESTROY: counted destroyed 0x%x with reference 0x%x", (int)this, (int)m_pref);
00094                 m_cPointerRefs--;
00095 //              WARNIF(m_cPointerRefs==0,"non-zero pointer ref");
00096                 Release();
00097         }
00098 
00099 #ifndef _WIN32
00100         Counted& operator = (const Counted& refc)
00101         {
00102                 if (m_pref != refc.m_pref){
00103                         Release();
00104                         m_pref=refc.m_pref;
00105                         Claim();
00106                 }
00107                 UD2("COPY: counted copied  0x%x from reference 0x%x", (int)this, (int)m_pref);
00108                 // dont change m_cPointerRefs;
00109                 return *this;
00110         }
00111 #endif
00112 
00113         Counted& operator = (Counted& refc)
00114         {
00115                 if (m_pref != refc.m_pref){
00116                         Release();
00117                         m_pref=refc.m_pref;
00118                         Claim();
00119                 }
00120                 UD2("COPY: counted copied  0x%x from reference 0x%x", (int)this, (int)m_pref);
00121                 // dont change m_cPointerRefs;
00122                 return *this;
00123         }
00124 
00125         int References() const {
00126                 return m_pref->m_cReferences;
00127         }
00128 
00129         int PointerReferences() const {
00130                 return m_cPointerRefs;
00131         }
00132 
00133         void Claim() const {
00134                 m_pref->m_cReferences++;
00135                 UD2("CLAIM: counted 0x%x reference 0x%x increased to %d", (int)this, (int)m_pref, m_pref->m_cReferences);
00136         }
00137 
00138         void Release() const ALWAYS_INLINE
00139         {
00140                 m_pref->m_cReferences--;
00141                 UD2("RELEASE: counted 0x%x reference 0x%x decreased to %d", (int)this, (int)m_pref, m_pref->m_cReferences);
00142                 if (m_pref->m_cReferences==0){
00143                         UD2("KILL: counted 0x%x reference 0x%x destroyed", (int)this, (int)m_pref);
00144                         delete m_pref;
00145                 }
00146                 UD2("RELEASE: done ");
00147         }
00148 
00149         bool AboutToDie(){
00150                 return (m_pref->m_cReferences==1);
00151         }
00152 
00153 };

00157 //============================================================================
00158 // pointer claiming:
00159 //
00160 //   Unlike object claiming, handled via the Claimed class above, which 
00161 //   ensures the proper management of an object's dynamically allocated content,
00162 //   pointer claiming manages the lifetime of dynamically created Claimed-derived 
00163 //   pointers.
00164 //
00165 //   a pointer which is created via new Claimed() begins as a pointer-claim 
00166 //   on it 
00167 //
00168 //   a pointer which has been claimed via ClaimPointer, or created via new
00169 //   must, be released by either calling ReleasePointer() or HandoffPointer() 
00170 //   or TakePointer()
00171 //
00172 //   a pointer which has been released via HandoffPointer() must be claimed
00173 //   via ClaimPointer(), and then handled as above
00174 // 
00175 //   a pointer released via ReleasePointer() may be destroyed, if thre are
00176 //   no other claims on it
00177 // 
00178 //   a pointer released via TakePointer() may be destroyed, if thre are
00179 //   no other claims on it, and an object claim is made and passed back as
00180 //   a stack-allocated object
00181 //
00182 //   when all claims are released via ReleasePointer() or TakePointer() the 
00183 //   pointer is deleted
00184 // 
00185 //============================================================================
00186 
00187 #if MULTITHREADPROTECTION
00188 #  include <pthread.h>
00189 namespace {
00190         pthread_mutex_t g_mutex;
00191         int Init(){
00192                 D("INITIALIZING REFCOUNT MUTEX");
00193                 pthread_mutex_init(&g_mutex,NULL);
00194         }
00195         int g_ignore=Init();
00196 }
00197 
00198 #  define REFCOUNT_LOCK pthread_mutex_lock(&g_mutex);
00199 #  define REFCOUNT_UNLOCK       pthread_mutex_unlock(&g_mutex);
00200 
00201 #else
00202 #  define REFCOUNT_LOCK 
00203 #  define REFCOUNT_UNLOCK       
00204 #endif
00205 
00206 //============================================================================
00207 //============================================================================
00208 // take ownership of a pointer. This commits you to either 
00209 // calling ReleasePointer() or HandoffPointer()
00210 template<class COUNTED>
00211 inline COUNTED* ClaimPointer(COUNTED *pcount) ALWAYS_INLINE;
00212 template<class COUNTED>
00213 inline COUNTED* ClaimPointer(COUNTED *pcount)
00214 {
00215         REFCOUNT_LOCK;
00216         CONGEAL_ASSERT(pcount != NULL);
00217         pcount->m_cPointerRefs++;
00218         REFCOUNT_UNLOCK;
00219         return pcount;
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00223 //============================================================================
00224 //============================================================================
00225 // dismiss ownership of a pointer, but do not free
00226 template<class COUNTED>
00227 inline COUNTED* HandoffPointer(COUNTED *pcount) ALWAYS_INLINE;
00228 template<class COUNTED>
00229 inline COUNTED* HandoffPointer(COUNTED *pcount)
00230 {
00231         REFCOUNT_LOCK;
00232         CONGEAL_ASSERT(pcount != NULL);
00233         CONGEAL_ASSERT(pcount->m_cPointerRefs > 0);
00234         pcount->m_cPointerRefs--;
00235         REFCOUNT_UNLOCK;
00236         return pcount;
00237 }
00238 
00239 
00240 //============================================================================
00241 //============================================================================
00242 // dismiss ownership of a pointer, potentially freeing
00243 inline void ReleasePointer(Counted *pcount) ALWAYS_INLINE;
00244 inline void ReleasePointer(Counted *pcount)
00245 {
00246         if(pcount == NULL){
00247                 return;
00248         }
00249 
00250         REFCOUNT_LOCK;
00251 
00252         UD4("PRELEASE: about to release pointer 0x%x %d/%d", 
00253                         (int)pcount, 
00254                         pcount->m_pref->m_cReferences,
00255                         pcount->m_cPointerRefs
00256         );
00257 
00258         UD1("PRELEASE: releasing pointer 0x%x %d", (int)pcount, pcount->m_cPointerRefs);
00259         if (pcount->m_cPointerRefs == 1){
00260                 delete pcount;
00261                 UD1("PKILL: deleteing pointer 0x%x", (int)pcount);
00262         }
00263         else{
00264                 pcount->m_cPointerRefs--;
00265                 UD1("PRELEASE: releasing pointer 0x%x %d", (int)pcount, pcount->m_cPointerRefs);
00266         }
00267 
00268         REFCOUNT_UNLOCK;
00269 }
00270 
00271 //============================================================================
00272 //============================================================================
00273 // release the current pointer and take claim of a new one, unless the
00274 // pointers are the same, in which case, do nothing
00275 template <class COUNTED> 
00276 inline void ChangePointer(COUNTED*& pcount1,  COUNTED*& pcount2) ALWAYS_INLINE;
00277 template <class COUNTED> 
00278 inline void ChangePointer(COUNTED*& pcount1,  COUNTED*& pcount2) 
00279 {
00280         REFCOUNT_LOCK;
00281         if (pcount1 != pcount2){
00282                 ReleasePointer(pcount1);
00283                 pcount1=pcount2;
00284                 ClaimPointer(pcount2);
00285         }
00286         REFCOUNT_UNLOCK;
00287 }
00288 
00289 
00290 //============================================================================
00291 //============================================================================
00292 // release the claim to the pointer, and return copy as a stack-based object
00293 template<class COUNTED>
00294 inline COUNTED DereferencePointer(COUNTED* pcounted){
00295         COUNTED counted=*pcounted;
00296         ReleasePointer(pcounted);
00297         counted.Release();
00298         return counted;
00299 }
